long_description: The Anthem AvaLung pack combines lightweight utility with all-mountain style and avalanche protection. It comes with a built-in AvaLung that sports improved shoulder strap integration and airflow. Designed to help extend your fresh air supply in the event of a burial, AvaLung provides a light, affordable and proven live-saving tool when traveling in avalanche terrain. Pack features reACTIV suspension with SwingArm shoulder straps and a breathable, hydrophobic back panel. Back panel access; front zippered avy-tool organizer. High-tenacity 210d Dyneema ripstop side panels. HiLo helmet holder, hipbelt stash pocket and top zippered accessory pocket. Tuckaway diagonal ski carry. The Anthem AvaLung pack features an insulated hydration sleeve (reservoir sold separately).
short_description: The Anthem AvaLung pack combines lightweight utility with all-mountain style and avalanche protection. It comes with a built-in AvaLung that sports improved shoulder strap integration and airflow.
